property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: An alternative title, to display as the component header

property.name: financialAccountRecordTypes
property.label: Financial Account Record Types
property.description: Comma separated list of financial account record types to display

property.name: fieldSetForFinancialAccount
property.label: Field Set for Financial Account
property.description: Name of the Field Set to display financial account details

property.name: fieldSetForFinancialHolding
property.label: Field Set for Financial Holding
property.description: Name of the Field Set to display financial holding details
